comment.body:
Nice work!
Please add body { backface-visibility: hidden } to sites you developing, it solves some scroll preformance issue with Chome.

You can test it here: http://127.0.0.1:43110/1EU1tbG9oC1A8jz2ouVwGZyQ5asrNsE4Vr/test/render.html (it switches the mode every 5 second, it's 60fps with it and 30fps without it for me)

> [odd](#comment_1_1EMpuiFM1NLZmAVyoAWnwi8VwiZVV4dcnN): I've had cache issues too with developing sites. Mostly CSS and JS. I usually visit the resource directly and Shift+F5 refresh it to get the latest version and clear the old one out of the cache.

Keep dev tools (F12) opened and checking disable cache works fine.
